mapper.select: select empno , ename, job, nvl(mgr,0) as mgr , hiredate , sal,nvl(comm,0) as comm , deptno from emp order by empno
mapper.insert: insert into emp(empno, ename, job, mgr, hiredate, sal, comm, deptno) values( #{empno}, #{ename}, #{job}, #{mgr}, #{hiredate}, #{sal}, #{comm}, #{deptno})
mapper.update: update emp set empno=#{empno}, ename=#{ename}, job=#{job}, mgr=#{mgr}, hiredate=#{hiredate}, sal=#{sal}, comm=#{comm}, deptno=#{deptno} where empno=#{empno}
